mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_dzone_data_06.select */ SELECT job_dt /* job_dt 작업_일자 character(8) */ ,seq /* seq 순번 numeric */ ,fclty_nm /* fclty_nm 시설_명 character varying(100) */ ,rdnmadr /* rdnmadr 소재지_도로명_주소 character varying(400) */ ,inmadr /* inmadr 소재지_지번_주소 character varying(400) */ ,fclty_type /* fclty_type 시설_유형 character varying(50) */ ,appn_ntfc_no /* appn_ntfc_no 위험_시설_지정_고시_번호 character varying(100) */ ,appn_date /* appn_date 위험_시설_지정_일자 character varying(10) */ ,appn_resn /* appn_resn 위험_시설_지정_사유 character varying(400) */ ,relis_date /* relis_date 위험_시설_해제_일자 character varying(10) */ ,latitude /* latitude 위도_값 numeric */ ,longitude /* longitude 경도_값 numeric */ ,et /* et 연장 character varying(20) */ ,bt /* bt 폭 character varying(20) */ ,fclty_adjncts /* fclty_adjncts 시설_부속물 character varying(100) */ ,phone_number /* phone_number 관리_기관_전화번호 character varying(20) */ ,institution_nm /* institution_nm 관리_기관_명 character varying(200) */ ,reference_date /* reference_date 데이터_기준_일자 character varying(10) */ ,instt_code /* instt_code 제공_기관_코드 character varying(20) */ ,instt_nm /* instt_nm 제공_기관_명 character varying(50) */ ,loc_no /* loc_no 위치_번호 numeric */ ,del_yn /* del_yn 삭제_여부 character(1) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ts_dzone_data_06 WHERE 1 = 1 AND job_dt = #{jobDt} /* job_dt 작업_일자 character(8) */ AND seq = #{seq} /* seq 순번 numeric */

/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_dzone_data_06.update */ UPDATE ts_dzone_data_06
,fclty_nm = #{fcltyNm} /* fclty_nm 시설_명 character varying(100) */
,rdnmadr = #{rdnmadr} /* rdnmadr 소재지_도로명_주소 character varying(400) */
,inmadr = #{inmadr} /* inmadr 소재지_지번_주소 character varying(400) */
,fclty_type = #{fcltyType} /* fclty_type 시설_유형 character varying(50) */
,appn_ntfc_no = #{appnNtfcNo} /* appn_ntfc_no 위험_시설_지정_고시_번호 character varying(100) */
,appn_date = #{appnDate} /* appn_date 위험_시설_지정_일자 character varying(10) */
,appn_resn = #{appnResn} /* appn_resn 위험_시설_지정_사유 character varying(400) */
,relis_date = #{relisDate} /* relis_date 위험_시설_해제_일자 character varying(10) */
,latitude = #{latitude} /* latitude 위도_값 numeric */
,longitude = #{longitude} /* longitude 경도_값 numeric */
,et = #{et} /* et 연장 character varying(20) */
,bt = #{bt} /* bt 폭 character varying(20) */
,fclty_adjncts = #{fcltyAdjncts} /* fclty_adjncts 시설_부속물 character varying(100) */
,phone_number = #{phoneNumber} /* phone_number 관리_기관_전화번호 character varying(20) */
,institution_nm = #{institutionNm} /* institution_nm 관리_기관_명 character varying(200) */
,reference_date = #{referenceDate} /* reference_date 데이터_기준_일자 character varying(10) */
,instt_code = #{insttCode} /* instt_code 제공_기관_코드 character varying(20) */
,instt_nm = #{insttNm} /* instt_nm 제공_기관_명 character varying(50) */

,del_yn = #{delYn} /* del_yn 삭제_여부 character(1) */

,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND job_dt = #{jobDt} /* job_dt 작업_일자 character(8) */ AND seq = #{seq} /* seq 순번 numeric */
